channel.title: Menacescape 508 beta
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/qxmmqd.png[/img]
Welcome to Menacescape 508 beta. I released the beta, i know the server still new but i like it that members get the feeling and report all the bugs they find. I started this project on 1/14/09
The intergrating in the website + server will be released after beta, or a little before. I think it was better because i don't think alot of members likes to register so i thought let them play and everything until i finish beta.
[U]Every account will be Reset after the beta![/U]
[U]Skills[/U]
* Attack, Strength, Defence, hitpoints - Done * Range - Started * Prayer - Done * Magic - Not started * Thieving - Started * Crafting - Done * Fletching - Done * Mining - Almost done * Fishing - Done * Firemaking - Done * Woodcutting - Done * Herblore - Done * Runecrafting - Done
[U]Mini-games[/U]
* Duel Areana - [COLOR=red]Not started[/color] * Bounty hunter - Done * Barrows - Done
[U]Quests[/U]
* Dragon slayer - [COLOR="lime"]Done[/COLOR]
Don't know what other quests to add. any suggestions?
[U]Update list[/U]
[CODE] 1. Started ( I started fresh, with a very early source ) 2. Added everything basic 3. I released beta, as i wanted to know what was wrong with source. 4. Added wild levels 5. Added the crap that you must be their level to attack them. 6. Added player following + combat following 7. Added Magic bank 8. Added Mining 9. Added Woodcutting 10. Added Skillcapes emotes 11. Added bone burying 12. Added that you click the icons in the skills tab's so it teleports you to the spot. 13. Added the skillcapes leaders at their spots. 14. Added dragon slayer quest, more quest to come 15. Added shops, just basic's one. 16. Added basic range, with animations, the bows now work. 17. Added animations to barrow items 18. Added NPC Diagaules 19. Fixed some of the random Dc's 20. Added 1 vs 1 Pking 21. Fixed the food glitch in wild, that when you click the food fast, it will save all your item and you won't lose none? it's fixed now, you will lose items. 22. Herblore Done 23. Slayer Done 24. Fishing Done 25. Firemaking Done 26. Runecrafting Done 27. Started on barrows mini-game. 28. Finished barrows mini-game. [/CODE]
Pictures;
None yet
To beta - You must use the client.
Download link : [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?nny22kmxqzj]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?nny22kmxqzj[/url]
The web client will be added soon so members can use that, the client will be needed until then. You don't add the Cache508 folder in the "C:", it already inside the client so it will be loaded from the client folders.
Thanks.

item.title: Menacescape 508 beta
item.dc:creator: @wtf_is_life wtf is life
item.description:
@wtf_is_life wrote:

Welcome to Menacescape 508 beta. I released the beta, i know the server still new but i like it that members get the feeling and report all the bugs they find. I started this project on 1/14/09

The intergrating in the website + server will be released after beta, or a little before. I think it was better because i don’t think alot of members likes to register so i thought let them play and everything until i finish beta.

Every account will be Reset after the beta!

Skills

  • Attack, Strength, Defence, hitpoints - Done
  • Range - Started
  • Prayer - Done
  • Magic - Not started
  • Thieving - Started
  • Crafting - Done
  • Fletching - Done
  • Mining - Almost done
  • Fishing - Done
  • Firemaking - Done
  • Woodcutting - Done
  • Herblore - Done
  • Runecrafting - Done

Mini-games

  • Duel Areana - [COLOR=red]Not started[/color]

  • Bounty hunter - Done

  • Barrows - Done

Quests

  • Dragon slayer - [COLOR="lime"]Done[/COLOR]

Don’t know what other quests to add. any suggestions?

Update list

1. Started ( I started fresh, with a very early source )
2. Added everything basic
3. I released beta, as i wanted to know what was wrong with source.
4. Added wild levels
5. Added the crap that you must be their level to attack them.
6. Added player following + combat following
7. Added Magic bank
8. Added Mining
9. Added Woodcutting
10. Added Skillcapes emotes
11. Added bone burying
12. Added that you click the icons in the skills tab's so it teleports you to the spot.
13. Added the skillcapes leaders at their spots.
14. Added dragon slayer quest, more quest to come 
15. Added shops, just basic's one.
16. Added basic range, with animations, the bows now work.
17. Added animations to barrow items
18. Added NPC Diagaules
19. Fixed some of the random Dc's
20. Added 1 vs 1 Pking
21. Fixed the food glitch in wild, that when you click the food fast, it will save all your item and you won't lose none? it's fixed now, you will lose items.
22. Herblore Done
23. Slayer Done
24. Fishing Done
25. Firemaking Done
26. Runecrafting Done
27. Started on barrows mini-game.
28. Finished barrows mini-game.

Pictures;

None yet

To beta - You must use the client.

Download link : http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?nny22kmxqzj

The web client will be added soon so members can use that, the client will be needed until then. You don’t add the Cache508 folder in the “C:”, it already inside the client so it will be loaded from the client folders.

Thanks.
